attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that where local councils allow the burial of dead bodies on Saturday and Sunday to pander to the religious idiosyncracies now arising all over the UK, do so to ALL religions,  including christianity, and if they refuse to open up the scheme to ALL religions then they should be legally barred from burying ANY dead bodies on Saturday or Sunday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Equity of treatment with incomers is all that we indigenous people want.
